verses.verse: Give ear<WH238>, O ye heavens<WH8064>, and I will speak<WH1696>; and hear<WH8085>, O earth<WH776>, the words<WH561> of my mouth<WH6310>.

My doctrine<WH3948> shall drop<WH6201> as the rain<WH4306>, my speech<WH565> shall distil<WH5140> as the dew<WH2919>, as the small rain<WH8164> upon the tender herb<WH1877>, and as the showers<WH7241> upon the grass<WH6212>:
Because I will publish<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068>: ascribe<WH3051> ye greatness<WH1433> unto our God<WH430>.

He is the Rock<WH6697>, his work<WH6467> is perfect<WH8549>: for all his ways<WH1870> are judgment<WH4941>: a God<WH410> of truth<WH530> and without iniquity<WH5766>, just<WH6662> and right<WH3477> is he.

They have corrupted<WH7843> themselves, their spot<WH3971> is not the spot of his children<WH1121>: they are a perverse<WH6141> and crooked<WH6618> generation<WH1755>. They have: Heb. He hath corrupted to himself their: or, that they are not his children, that is their blot

Do ye thus requite<WH1580> the LORD<WH3068>, O foolish<WH5036> people<WH5971> and unwise<WH2450>? is not he thy father<WH1> that hath bought<WH7069> thee? hath he not made<WH6213> thee, and established<WH3559> thee?

Remember<WH2142> the days<WH3117> of old<WH5769>, consider<WH995> the years<WH8141> of many<WH1755> generations<WH1755>: ask<WH7592> thy father<WH1>, and he will shew<WH5046> thee; thy elders<WH2205>, and they will tell<WH559> thee. many: Heb. generation and generation

When the most High<WH5945> divided<WH5157> to the nations<WH1471> their inheritance<WH5157>, when he separated<WH6504> the sons<WH1121> of Adam<WH120>, he set<WH5324> the bounds<WH1367> of the people<WH5971> according to the number<WH4557> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
For the LORD'S<WH3068> portion<WH2506> is his people<WH5971>; Jacob<WH3290> is the lot<WH2256> of his inheritance<WH5159>. lot: Heb. cord

He found<WH4672> him in a desert<WH4057> land<WH776>, and in the waste<WH8414> howling<WH3214> wilderness<WH3452>; he led him about<WH5437>, he instructed<WH995> him, he kept<WH5341> him as the apple<WH380> of his eye<WH5869>. led: or, compassed

As an eagle<WH5404> stirreth up<WH5782> her nest<WH7064>, fluttereth<WH7363> over her young<WH1469>, spreadeth abroad<WH6566> her wings<WH3671>, taketh<WH3947> them, beareth<WH5375> them on her wings<WH84>:
So the LORD<WH3068> alone<WH910> did lead<WH5148> him, and there was no strange<WH5236> god<WH410> with him.

He made him ride<WH7392> on the high places<WH1116> of the earth<WH776>, that he might eat<WH398> the increase<WH8570> of the fields<WH7704>; and he made him to suck<WH3243> honey<WH1706> out of the rock<WH5553>, and oil<WH8081> out of the flinty<WH2496> rock<WH6697>;

Butter<WH2529> of kine<WH1241>, and milk<WH2461> of sheep<WH6629>, with fat<WH2459> of lambs<WH3733>, and rams<WH352> of the breed<WH1121> of Bashan<WH1316>, and goats<WH6260>, with the fat<WH2459> of kidneys<WH3629> of wheat<WH2406>; and thou didst drink<WH8354> the pure<WH2561> blood<WH1818> of the grape<WH6025>.

But Jeshurun<WH3484> waxed fat<WH8080>, and kicked<WH1163>: thou art waxen fat<WH8080>, thou art grown thick<WH5666>, thou art covered<WH3780> with fatness; then he forsook<WH5203> God<WH433> which made<WH6213> him, and lightly esteemed<WH5034> the Rock<WH6697> of his salvation<WH3444>.
They provoked him to jealousy<WH7065> with strange<WH2114> gods, with abominations<WH8441> provoked they him to anger<WH3707>.

They sacrificed<WH2076> unto devils<WH7700>, not to God<WH433>; to gods<WH430> whom they knew<WH3045> not, to new<WH2319> gods that came<WH935> newly<WH7138> up<WH935>, whom your fathers<WH1> feared<WH8175> not. not to: or, which were not God
Of the Rock<WH6697> that begat<WH3205> thee thou art unmindful<WH7876>, and hast forgotten<WH7911> God<WH410> that formed<WH2342> thee.
And when the LORD<WH3068> saw<WH7200> it, he abhorred<WH5006> them, because of the provoking<WH3708> of his sons<WH1121>, and of his daughters<WH1323>. abhorred: or, despised

And he said<WH559>, I will hide<WH5641> my face<WH6440> from them, I will see<WH7200> what their end<WH319> shall be: for they are a very froward<WH8419> generation<WH1755>, children<WH1121> in whom is no faith<WH529>.

They have moved me to jealousy<WH7065> with that which is not<WH3808> God<WH410>; they have provoked me to anger<WH3707> with their vanities<WH1892>: and I will move them to jealousy<WH7065> with those which are not a people<WH5971>; I will provoke them to anger<WH3707> with a foolish<WH5036> nation<WH1471>.

For a fire<WH784> is kindled<WH6919> in mine anger<WH639>, and shall burn<WH3344> unto the lowest<WH8482> hell<WH7585>, and shall consume<WH398> the earth<WH776> with her increase<WH2981>, and set on fire<WH3857> the foundations<WH4144> of the mountains<WH2022>. shall burn: or, hath burned shall consume: or, hath consumed
I will heap<WH5595> mischiefs<WH7451> upon them; I will spend<WH3615> mine arrows<WH2671> upon them.

They shall be burnt<WH4198> with hunger<WH7458>, and devoured<WH3898> with burning heat<WH7565>, and with bitter<WH4815> destruction<WH6986>: I will also send<WH7971> the teeth<WH8127> of beasts<WH929> upon them, with the poison<WH2534> of serpents<WH2119> of the dust<WH6083>. heat: Heb. coals

The sword<WH2719> without<WH2351>, and terror<WH367> within<WH2315>, shall destroy<WH7921> both the young man<WH970> and the virgin<WH1330>, the suckling<WH3243> also with the man<WH376> of gray hairs<WH7872>. within: Heb. from the chambers destroy: Heb. bereave
I said<WH559>, I would scatter them into corners<WH6284>, I would make the remembrance<WH2143> of them to cease<WH7673> from among men<WH582>:

Were it not<WH3884> that I feared<WH1481> the wrath<WH3708> of the enemy<WH341>, lest their adversaries<WH6862> should behave themselves strangely<WH5234>, and lest they should say<WH559>, Our hand<WH3027> is high<WH7311>, and the LORD<WH3068> hath not done<WH6466> all this. Our: or, Our high hand, and not the LORD hath done
For they are a nation<WH1471> void<WH6> of counsel<WH6098>, neither is there any understanding<WH8394> in them.
O that<WH3863> they were wise<WH2449>, that they understood<WH7919> this, that they would consider<WH995> their latter end<WH319>!

How should one<WH259> chase<WH7291> a thousand<WH505>, and two<WH8147> put ten<WH7233> thousand<WH505> to flight<WH5127>, except<WH3808> their Rock<WH6697> had sold<WH4376> them<WH3588>, and the LORD<WH3068> had shut them up<WH5462>?
For their rock<WH6697> is not as our Rock<WH6697>, even our enemies<WH341> themselves being judges<WH6414>.

For their vine<WH1612> is of the vine<WH1612> of Sodom<WH5467>, and of the fields<WH7709> of Gomorrah<WH6017>: their grapes<WH6025> are grapes<WH6025> of gall<WH7219>, their clusters<WH811> are bitter<WH4846>: of the vine: or, worse than the vine
Their wine<WH3196> is the poison<WH2534> of dragons<WH8577>, and the cruel<WH393> venom<WH7219> of asps<WH6620>.
Is not this laid up in store<WH3647> with me, and sealed up<WH2856> among my treasures<WH214>?

To me belongeth vengeance<WH5359>, and recompence<WH8005>; their foot<WH7272> shall slide<WH4131> in due time<WH6256>: for the day<WH3117> of their calamity<WH343> is at hand<WH7138>, and the things that shall come<WH6264> upon them make haste<WH2363>.

For the LORD<WH3068> shall judge<WH1777> his people<WH5971>, and repent<WH5162> himself for his servants<WH5650>, when he seeth<WH7200> that their power<WH3027> is gone<WH235>, and there is none<WH657> shut up<WH6113>, or left<WH5800>. power: Heb. hand
And he shall say<WH559>, Where are their gods<WH430>, their rock<WH6697> in whom they trusted<WH2620>,

Which did eat<WH398> the fat<WH2459> of their sacrifices<WH2077>, and drank<WH8354> the wine<WH3196> of their drink offerings<WH5257>? let them rise up<WH6965> and help<WH5826> you, and be your protection<WH5643>. your: Heb. an hiding for you

See<WH7200> now that I, even I, am he, and there is no god<WH430> with me: I kill<WH4191>, and I make alive<WH2421>; I wound<WH4272>, and I heal<WH7495>: neither is there any that can deliver<WH5337> out of my hand<WH3027>.
For I lift up<WH5375> my hand<WH3027> to heaven<WH8064>, and say<WH559>, I live<WH2416> for ever<WH5769>.

If I whet<WH8150> my glittering<WH1300> sword<WH2719>, and mine hand<WH3027> take hold<WH270> on judgment<WH4941>; I will render<WH7725> vengeance<WH5359> to mine enemies<WH6862>, and will reward<WH7999> them that hate<WH8130> me.

I will make mine arrows<WH2671> drunk<WH7937> with blood<WH1818>, and my sword<WH2719> shall devour<WH398> flesh<WH1320>; and that with the blood<WH1818> of the slain<WH2491> and of the captives<WH7633>, from the beginning<WH7218> of revenges<WH6546> upon the enemy<WH341>.

Rejoice<WH7442>, O ye nations<WH1471>, with his people<WH5971>: for he will avenge<WH5358> the blood<WH1818> of his servants<WH5650>, and will render<WH7725> vengeance<WH5359> to his adversaries<WH6862>, and will be merciful<WH3722> unto his land<WH127>, and to his people<WH5971>. Rejoice: or, Praise his people, ye nations: or, Sing ye

And Moses<WH4872> came<WH935> and spake<WH1696> all the words<WH1697> of this song<WH7892> in the ears<WH241> of the people<WH5971>, he, and Hoshea<WH1954> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>. Hoshea: or, Joshua
And Moses<WH4872> made an end<WH3615> of speaking<WH1696> all these words<WH1697> to all Israel<WH3478>:

And he said<WH559> unto them, Set<WH7760> your hearts<WH3824> unto all the words<WH1697> which I testify<WH5749> among you this day<WH3117>, which ye shall command<WH6680> your children<WH1121> to observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213>, all the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451>.

For it is not a vain<WH7386> thing<WH1697> for you; because it is your life<WH2416>: and through this thing<WH1697> ye shall prolong<WH748> your days<WH3117> in the land<WH127>, whither ye go over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383> to possess<WH3423> it.
And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> that selfsame<WH6106> day<WH3117>, saying<WH559>,

Get thee up<WH5927> into this mountain<WH2022> Abarim<WH5682>, unto mount<WH2022> Nebo<WH5015>, which is in the land<WH776> of Moab<WH4124>, that is over against<WH6440> Jericho<WH3405>; and behold<WH7200> the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, which I give<WH5414> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> for a possession<WH272>:

And die<WH4191> in the mount<WH2022> whither thou goest up<WH5927>, and be gathered<WH622> unto thy people<WH5971>; as Aaron<WH175> thy brother<WH251> died<WH4191> in mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023>, and was gathered<WH622> unto his people<WH5971>:

Because ye trespassed<WH4603> against me among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> at the waters<WH4325> of Meribah-Kadesh<WH4808> <WH6946>, in the wilderness<WH4057> of Zin<WH6790>; because ye sanctified<WH6942> me not in the midst<WH8432> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>. Meribah-Kadesh: or, strife at Kadesh
Yet thou shalt see<WH7200> the land<WH776> before thee; but thou shalt not go<WH935> thither unto the land<WH776> which I give<WH5414> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
